x-sap-shortText: API to access details of user interface style settings.

x-servers.description: OData APIs for the SuccessFactors Data Centers

info.title: User Interface Themes
info.description: API to access details of user interface style settings that available for theming, such as CSS values for color, style definition, and configurations.

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific
